item.title: Cannot un-fork in github
item.description: Although you cannot “un-fork” a GitHub repository, you can do so by cloning what you’ve got into a new repository then deleting the original. This way, you’ve also removed the fork relationship.

item.title: How to create a github page
item.description: Making github pages is incredibly easy
